timeline.message:
Fix for issue #1390

Fix for issue #1390

timeline.bodyText: this seems unrelated, app_id is not related to the automatically generated IDs. I am assuming it refers to the 15 character long app_id that's attached to a study in study-builder.
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Yes, app_id is not the primary key column. This column is used to store Custom App id sent by mobile or angular. As Angular do not have app id details to register a user, we are storing component name(PARTICIPANT MANAGER) in this column .
replies.author: aswinijena100
